item.title: Activist Elliott reaches key agreement with Charles River. Here are three ways to create value
item.description: The firm has three possible paths toward value creation at the drug development company.

item.title: These stocks, including Microsoft, just entered overbought territory and may be due for a pullback
item.description: A number of stocks could be due for a turnaround after seeing meaningful gains this past week amid a broader market pullback.

item.title: Five stocks with major upside following earnings, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Morgan Stanley named a slew of stocks to buy following earnings

item.title: Palantir is one stock to own in hopes of its growing to a trillion dollar market cap, investor says
item.description: Will McGough, Prime Capital Financial director of investments, said Palantir is a buy even though the stock has rallied 55% this year.

item.title: Investors should proceed with caution when buying these corporate bonds, Wells Fargo says
item.description: The environment has changed for lower-rated investment grade corporates, says Wells Fargo. Here's what income investors should know.
